title: The earnest of our inheritance together with a description of the new heauen and the new earth, and a demonstration of the glorious resurrection of the bodie in the same substance. Preached at Pauls Crosse the second day of August. 1612. By Thomas Draxe Bachelour of Diuinity.
author: Draxe, Thomas, d. 1618.
publisher: Imprinted by F[elix] K[ingston] for George Norton,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
